name: Haunted Halls of Horror
description:
A Team Project by Yadel Negash and Toma Brown

You wake up in a dark, mysterious maze with no recollection of what happened prior. The situation seems hopeless. However, victims and survivors before you left some clues behind to help you escape the maze. Use your clues and flashlight to find your way out of the maze before you and the victims of the maze become one and the same.

CONTROLS

-WASD to move

-SPACE to jump

-LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to pick up items and view clues
